titleStmt.title: A verie godlie and necessary sermon preached before the yong countesse of Cumberland in the North, the 14 of Nouember, 1577. By Christopher Shutt.
titleStmt.author: Shutte, Christopher, d. 1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: By [H. Middleton? for] Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from STC; publication date from colophon.
Running title reads: A godly sermon preached in the North.
Printer's device (McKerrow 191) on recto of G4, final leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
